title: Uncovering Your Big Idea
description:
We unpack the concept of a big idea, share some examples, and suggest how to start to define one for yourself.

LINKS

  • Larry Tesler
  • Finding Your Mission
  • The Elon Musk Post Series
author: jstark@jonathanstark.com (Jonathan Stark and Rochelle Moulton)
